contentTypes.name: Viewport
contentTypes.description: An auxiliary container that helps to integrate arbitrary entries into static pages.

contentTypes.name: Content Block
contentTypes.description: The data model for content block component

validations.message: The image is too large (2048 x 2048 is the max allowed size).
The image file is too large (1MB is the max  allowed size).

contentTypes.name: Banner
contentTypes.description: A block with background image; and a small area intended for brief textual content. The textual area is positioned in a fixed position relative to the block sides, and it has its own background for readability.

validations.message: Images larger than 2400 x 1800 px are prohibited for performance reasons.
Images larger than 1MB are prohibited for performance reasons.

contentTypes.name: Article Card
contentTypes.description: A card looking component that represents articles for search, index and other pages.

contentTypes.name: Modal
contentTypes.description: Wraps the TC themeable modal window to the modal content type.

contentTypes.name: Image
contentTypes.description: Component that renders images

contentTypes.name: Shape
contentTypes.description: A generic component that renders SVG based shapes.

contentTypes.name: Member Card
contentTypes.description: A card looking component representing member/speaker/person.

contentTypes.name: Article
contentTypes.description: A generic container for educational resources/pages.

validations.message: Image has to be min 760px x 555px

contentTypes.name: Countdown
contentTypes.description: Generic Countdown model

contentTypes.name: Content Slider
contentTypes.description: Slide/cycle content

contentTypes.name: Navigation Menu
contentTypes.description: Model that will render menus of links with optional sub-links

contentTypes.name: Navigation Menu Item
contentTypes.description: Item in a Navigation Menu

contentTypes.name: Person
contentTypes.description: Generic model representing a person

contentTypes.name: Route
contentTypes.description: A Route that can render a Viewport at its endpoint, and also include sub-routes with Viewports.

contentTypes.name: Tabs Item
contentTypes.description: Item in tabs model

contentTypes.name: Tabs
contentTypes.description: Generic tabs component

contentTypes.name: Video
contentTypes.description: External video source loaded in iframe

contentTypes.name: Content Category
contentTypes.description: Represents subcategory for track category.

contentTypes.name: Content Taxonomy
contentTypes.description: Represents the content categorization tree.

contentTypes.name: Thrive Poll Interval
contentTypes.description: Model holding the poll time used(by community-app) to pull articles from TC blog to Thrive.

validations.message: Must be more than 1h poll interval

settings.helpText: Entry name inside CMS.
The list of entries to show inside the viewport.
Number of grid columns. Defaults to 3 if not explicitly set.
Specifies the gaps (gutters) between rows and columns of the grid. Defaults to 10px if not explicitly set.
Content block theme
For blue card use: {"background-color": "#2984BD"}
Banner name. It will be shown only in CMS, and not rendered at the banner itself.
Text to render at the banner.
Background image.
Base style of the banner.
Optional. Additional styles for banner container (root) element.
Optional. Additional styles for the content wrapper element. This element takes care about positioning of textual content, and its background.
Optional. Additional styles for the textual content.
The article this card would present.
Select the desired card look theme.
Extra CSS styles to applied on container
Extra CSS styles to be applied on content wrapper
The image source
A SVG file that define "clip-path" to be applied on the image. Contentful can't display it thus do not get confused just publish it after upload.
Inline CSS styles to apply on container
Select the shape SVG file to be applied to the component
Embed the shape as inline SVG element. Defaults to "No" which means the shape is applied as background image to the element.
Shapes need some height defined. Defaults to 100px if not set otherwise
Define extra CSS inline styles that will overwrite defaults
Recommended size: 30px x 30px; TC colors for icon area: Green - #5CC900; Blue - #15ACEC; Orange - #FD7D00
Member image. Recommended size: 305px x 219px
The address for linking
Default theme is applied if not otherwise specified
1+ required
If you create new "Content Category" you will need to link it as "Content Taxonomy" item as well. To do so go to: https://app.contentful.com/spaces/piwi0eufbb2g/entries/15caxocitaxyK65K9oSd91
1+ required
Creation date of content
Suggested format: 5 min read
Featured Image of article in index/search pages. Min size 760px x 555px
Recommended for you resources
Making members see what’s previous article if selected
Making members see what’s next article if selected
Extra CSS styles for container
This is lockup field used internally to represent comments count on article cards. Please, do not change it!
If selected article links will redirect(open in new tab) to the "Content URL" address if any is defined.
If type is "Video" set this link to the YouTube embed link to have the video player automatically embedded.
Slide duration in seconds
Defaults to 'center' if not set otherwise
Menu navigation logo on the left max 54px x 54px. If not set defaults to standard TC logo
Pick a viewport to link
The URL segment represented by the route.  Ex.  /test/
Text of the link in Navigation Menus. Will default to `name` if not set otherwise.
If YES this route won't be rendered in navigation menus
A Viewport to be rendered at the provided URL
Additional sub-routes which will available at /URL/childURL/
Page Title Meta Tag
Page Description Meta Tag
